dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1977
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Resting for health reasons, she comments on the activity around her. Reflects on "ebbing of life," waiting, and the phrase "now and at the hour of our death" from the Hail Mary.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 578 1977-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
